main.name: Miguel Guerra-Mondragon
main.bio: I have been using computers to play video games since I can remember, and I've always loved the idea of being able to build something, and that's what software allows me to do. Combine my imagination with my tools to create.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build projects for your business.!
main.skills: VueJs, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, NodeJs, C#, Java

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

education.description: OOP, UI/UX Design, Web Development, Data Analysis, Human-Computer Interaction and More

certificate.description: Game Development, Game Engine Development, 3D Modeling, Level Creation and More

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: Develop inhouse or outsourced websites in various sectors. This includes competitor research, sitemapping, designing, developing, SEO, and testing.

work2.title: Event Cooordinator/Staff
work2.description: Local gaming lounge where I assist in running tournaments, events, and occasionally work regular shift. Been helping out here for over 2 years, but joined the team in August

work3.title: Freelance Web Designer
work3.description: Contacted clients on UpWork to redesign the frontend of their websites. Worked closely with each client to ensure everything they requested was put in. Weekly meetings with clients on updates/feedback.

work4.title: Lead Pharmacy Technician
work4.description: Began as a cashier back in 2016, going through roles such as supervisor, operations manager, pharmacy technician, and eventually lead. These positions taught me a lot about communcating with people, leadership, respect, and how to learn quickly

resume.skillssectiontitle: Motivated by the Desire to achieve Success
resume.skillssectiondescription: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dolorem, odit! Perspiciatis et consequuntur non, modi quo mollitia labore laborum voluptas quia officiis fugit soluta molestias quaerat sapiente sunt.

projects.title: Riot Games Tracker
projects.description: This VueJS application was made so users can input their Riot Games name and look at their rank for all Riot published titles such as, League of Legends, Teamfight Tactics, Valorant and Legends of Runeterra. I made this to gain more experience working with APIs and make a visual way to share stats with friends.

projects.title: Project MONTRIO
projects.description: Top-down, zelda inspried, action RPG developed in Game Maker Studios 2. In the past I have enjoyed making game mechanics, or movement and then scraping the idea, but I am going to be dedicating time to create this project by following lots of tutorials, and constantly posting updates on it.
projects.technologies: Game Maker Studios 2, Aseprite, Youtube Tutorials

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: The site you are currently on! I decided to use a framework based on VueJs, NuxtJs for the frontend. To gain more experience using data, I compiled all my data (name, social, portfolio, even this description you're currently reading) into a JSON file and I grab the information for each section that way. This also makes it much easier to update information.

projects.title: Psychology Web Game
projects.description: Worked with a group of three other students to develop an educational video game for ASU’s online school (K-12) psychology class. The game features a scavenger hunt for clues that teach students about the different types of psychology.

projects.title: Pizza Hut Delivery Tracking
projects.description: Worked with a group of three other students to develop a proof of concept driver tracking app for Pizza Hut’s mobile app. Using Android Studios and Google Maps API, we developed a working prototype between two phones using Firebase, that functioned similar to Uber Eats or Lyft. The app has driver time estimates, live driver tracking, push notification, and more.
projects.technologies: Java, XML, Firebase, Google API, Android Studios
